Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46118 affecting package rabbitmq-server for versions less than 3.13.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-46118 affecting package rabbitmq-server for versions less than 3.13.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package rabbitmq-server is earlier than 3.13.0-1, affected by CVE-2023-46118
